page.title: 08COMMUNITY LINKS IN HATFIELD
page.content: At Hatfield High School Mrs Lightfoot the school's Child Care teacher provides the pupils with two nursing courses for the 4th, 5th, and 6th form students interested in nursing, social work, and child care. The courses last two years and involve work experience at a number of establishments such as nurseries, First Schools, Chase School for Handicapped Children, and Doncaster Royal Infirmary. Through Mrs Townend,the careers teacher The School also provides a volutary work experience scheme called 'TRIDENT', Which involves a number of employers in the area e.g banks, shops , schools, builders, etc. Approx 160 pupils a year are involved each working for 3 weeks. On occasion this has led to Youth Training Schemes and permanent jobs.
